entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
